verses.verse: Then Solomon<WH8010> assembled<WH6950> the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and all the heads<WH7218> of the tribes,<WH4294> the princes<WH5387> of the fathers<WH1>' households of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> to bring up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> out of the city<WH5892> of David,<WH1732> which is Zion.<WH6726>

All the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> assembled<WH6950> themselves to king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> at the feast,<WH2282> in the month<WH3391> Ethanim,<WH388> which is the seventh<WH7637> month.<WH3391>
All the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came,<WH935> and the priests<WH3548> took up<WH5375> the ark.<WH727>

They brought up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and all the holy<WH6944> vessels<WH3627> that were in the Tent;<WH168> even these the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> brought up.<WH5927>

King<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> and all the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> who were assembled<WH3259> to him,<WH6440> were with him before the ark,<WH727> sacrificing<WH2076> sheep<WH6629> and cattle,<WH1241> that could not be counted<WH5608> nor numbered<WH4487> for multitude.<WH7230>

The priests<WH3548> brought in<WH935> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> to its place,<WH4725> into the oracle<WH1687> of the house,<WH1004> to the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> place,<WH3671> even under the wings of the cherubim.<WH3742>
For the cherubim<WH3742> spread forth<WH6566> their wings<WH3671> over the place<WH4725> of the ark,<WH727> and the cherubim<WH3742> covered<WH5526> the ark<WH727> and its poles<WH905> above.<WH4605>

The poles<WH905> were so long<WH748> that the ends<WH7218> of the poles<WH905> were seen from<WH7200> the holy<WH6944> place before<WH6440> the oracle;<WH1687> but they were not seen<WH7200> outside:<WH2351> and there they are to this day.<WH3117>

There was nothing in the ark<WH727> except<WH7535> the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> which Moses<WH4872> put<WH3240> there at Horeb,<WH2722> when Yahweh<WH3068> made<WH3772> a covenant with the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> when they came out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
It came to pass,<WH3548> when the priests had come out<WH3318> of the holy<WH6944> place,<WH6051> that the cloud filled<WH4390> the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068>

so that the priests<WH3548> could<WH3201> not stand<WH5975> to minister<WH8334> by reason<WH6440> of the cloud;<WH6051> for the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> filled<WH4390> the house<WH1004> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Then Solomon<WH8010> said,<WH559> "Yahweh<WH3068> has said<WH559> that he would dwell<WH7931> in the thick darkness.<WH6205>
I have surely<WH1129> built<WH1129> you a house<WH1004> of habitation,<WH2073> a place<WH4349> for you to dwell in<WH2073> forever.<WH5769>"
The king<WH4428> turned<WH5437> his face<WH6440> about,<WH5437> and blessed<WH1288> all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel:<WH3478> and all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel<WH3478> stood.<WH5975>

He said,<WH559> "Blessed<WH1288> is Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> who spoke<WH1696> with his mouth<WH6310> to David<WH1732> your father,<WH1> and has with his hand<WH3027> fulfilled<WH4390> it,<WH559> saying,

<WH3117> 'Since the day that I brought my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> out<WH3318> of Egypt,<WH4714> I chose<WH977> no city<WH5892> out of all the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> to build<WH1129> a house,<WH1004> that my name<WH8034> might be there;<WH977> but I chose David<WH1732> to be over my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>'
"Now it was in the heart<WH3824> of David<WH1732> my father<WH1> to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

But Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to David<WH1732> my father,<WH1> <WH3282> 'Whereas it was in your heart<WH3824> to build<WH1129> a house<WH1004> for my name,<WH8034> you did well<WH2895> that it was in your heart.<WH3824>

Nevertheless,<WH7535> you shall not build<WH1129> the house;<WH1004> but your son<WH1121> who shall come forth out<WH3318> of your body,<WH2504> he shall build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> for my name.<WH8034>'

Yahweh<WH3068> has established<WH6965> his word<WH1697> that he spoke;<WH1696> for I have risen up<WH6965> in the place of David<WH1732> my father,<WH1> and I sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of Israel,<WH3478> as Yahweh<WH3068> promised,<WH1696> and have built<WH1129> the house<WH1004> for the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

There I have set<WH7760> a place<WH4725> for the ark,<WH727> in which is the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he made<WH3772> with our fathers,<WH1> when he brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>"

Solomon<WH8010> stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh<WH3068> in the presence of<WH5048> all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel,<WH3478> and spread forth<WH6566> his hands<WH3709> toward heaven;<WH8064>

and he said,<WH559> "Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> there is no God<WH430> like you,<WH8064> in heaven above,<WH4605> or on earth<WH776> beneath;<WH8104> who keep covenant<WH1285> and loving kindness<WH2617> with your servants,<WH5650> who walk<WH1980> before<WH6440> you with all their heart;<WH3820>

who have kept<WH8104> with your servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> my father<WH1> that which you promised<WH1696> him.<WH1696> Yes, you spoke with your mouth,<WH6310> and have fulfilled<WH4390> it with your hand,<WH3027> as it is this day.<WH3117>

Now therefore,<WH3068> may Yahweh, the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> keep<WH8104> with your servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> my father<WH1> that which you have promised<WH1696> him,<WH559> saying, <WH3772> 'There shall not fail you a man<WH376> in my sight<WH6440> to sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of Israel,<WH3478> if<WH7535> only your children<WH1121> take heed<WH8104> to their way,<WH1870> to walk<WH3212> before<WH6440> me as you have walked<WH1980> before me.<WH6440>'
"Now therefore,<WH430> God of Israel,<WH3478> please let your word<WH1697> be verified,<WH539> which you spoke<WH1696> to your servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> my father.<WH1>

But will God<WH430> in very deed<WH552> dwell<WH3427> on the earth?<WH776> Behold,<WH8064> heaven and the heaven<WH8064> of heavens<WH8064> can't<WH3557> contain you;<WH637> how much less this house<WH1004> that I have built!<WH1129>

Yet have respect<WH6437> for the prayer<WH8605> of your servant,<WH5650> and for his supplication,<WH8467> Yahweh<WH3068> my God,<WH430> to listen<WH8085> to the cry<WH7440> and to the prayer<WH8605> which your servant<WH5650> prays<WH6419> before<WH6440> you this day;<WH3117>

that your eyes<WH5869> may be open<WH6605> toward this house<WH1004> night<WH3915> and day,<WH3117> even toward the place<WH4725> of which you have said,<WH559> <WH8034> 'My name shall be there;<WH8085>' to listen to the prayer<WH8605> which your servant<WH5650> shall pray<WH6419> toward this place.<WH4725>

Listen<WH8085> to the supplication<WH8467> of your servant,<WH5650> and of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> when they shall pray<WH6419> toward this place.<WH4725> Yes,<WH8085> hear in heaven,<WH8064> your dwelling<WH3427> place;<WH4725> and when you hear,<WH8085> forgive.<WH5545>

"If a man<WH376> sins<WH2398> against his neighbor,<WH7453> and an oath<WH423> is laid<WH5375> on him to cause him to swear,<WH422> and he comes<WH935> and swear<WH423> before<WH6440> your altar<WH4196> in this house;<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> in heaven,<WH8064> and do,<WH6213> and judge<WH8199> your servants,<WH5650> condemning<WH7561> the wicked,<WH7563> to bring<WH5414> his way<WH1870> on his own head,<WH7218> and justifying<WH6663> the righteous,<WH6662> to give<WH5414> him according to his righteousness.<WH6666>

"When your people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478> are struck down<WH5062> before<WH6440> the enemy,<WH341> because they have sinned<WH2398> against you;<WH7725> if they turn again to you,<WH3034> and confess your name,<WH8034> and pray<WH6419> and make supplication<WH2603> to you in this house:<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> in heaven,<WH8064> and forgive<WH5545> the sin<WH2403> of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and bring them again<WH7725> to the land<WH127> which you gave<WH5414> to their fathers.<WH1>

"When the sky<WH8064> is shut up,<WH6113> and there is no rain,<WH4306> because they have sinned<WH2398> against you;<WH6419> if they pray toward this place,<WH4725> and confess<WH3034> your name,<WH8034> and turn<WH7725> from their sin,<WH2403> when you afflict them:<WH6031>

then hear<WH8085> in heaven,<WH8064> and forgive<WH5545> the sin<WH2403> of your servants,<WH5650> and of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> when you teach<WH3384> them the good<WH2896> way<WH1870> in which they should walk;<WH3212> and send<WH5414> rain<WH4306> on your land,<WH776> which you have given<WH5414> to your people<WH5971> for an inheritance.<WH5159>

"If there is famine<WH7458> in the land,<WH776> if there is pestilence,<WH1698> if there is blight,<WH7711> mildew,<WH3420> locust<WH697> or caterpillar;<WH2625> if their enemy<WH341> besieges<WH6887> them in the land<WH776> of their cities;<WH8179> whatever plague,<WH5061> whatever sickness there is;<WH4245>

whatever prayer<WH8605> and supplication<WH8467> is made by any man,<WH120> or by all your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> who shall each<WH376> know<WH3045> the plague<WH5061> of his own heart,<WH3824> and spread forth<WH6566> his hands<WH3709> toward this house:<WH1004>

then hear<WH8085> in heaven,<WH8064> your dwelling<WH3427> place,<WH4349> and forgive,<WH5545> and do,<WH6213> and render<WH5414> to every man<WH376> according to all his ways,<WH1870> whose heart<WH3824> you know;<WH3045> (for you,<WH3045> even you only, know the hearts<WH3824> of all the children<WH1121> of men;<WH120>)
that they may fear<WH3372> you all the days<WH3117> that they live<WH2416> in<WH6440> the land<WH127> which you gave<WH5414> to our fathers.<WH1>
"Moreover concerning the foreigner,<WH5237> who is not of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> when he shall come out<WH935> of a far<WH7350> country<WH776> for<WH4616> your name<WH8034>'s sake

(for they shall hear<WH8085> of your great<WH1419> name,<WH8034> and of your mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and of your outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220>); when he shall come<WH935> and pray<WH6419> toward this house;<WH1004>

hear<WH8085> in heaven,<WH8064> your dwelling<WH3427> place,<WH4349> and do<WH6213> according to all that the foreigner<WH5237> calls<WH7121> to you for;<WH5971> that all the peoples of the earth<WH776> may know<WH3045> your name,<WH8034> to fear<WH3372> you,<WH5971> as do your people Israel,<WH3478> and that they may know<WH3045> that this house<WH1004> which I have built<WH1129> is called<WH7121> by your name.<WH8034>

"If your people<WH5971> go out<WH3318> to battle<WH4421> against their enemy,<WH341> by whatever<WH1870> way you shall send<WH7971> them,<WH6419> and they pray to Yahweh<WH3068> toward<WH1870> the city<WH5892> which you have chosen,<WH977> and toward the house<WH1004> which I have built<WH1129> for your name;<WH8034>
then hear<WH8085> in heaven<WH8064> their prayer<WH8605> and their supplication,<WH8467> and maintain<WH6213> their cause.<WH4941>

If they sin<WH2398> against you<WH120> (for there is no man who doesn't<WH2398> sin), and you are angry<WH599> with them,<WH5414> and deliver them to the enemy,<WH341> so that they carry them away<WH7617> captive<WH7617> to<WH6440> the land<WH776> of the enemy,<WH341> far<WH7350> off or near;<WH7138>

yet if they shall repent<WH7725> in the land<WH776> where they are carried captive,<WH7617> and turn<WH7725> again,<WH2603> and make supplication to you in the land<WH776> of those who carried them captive,<WH7617> saying,<WH559> <WH2398> 'We have sinned, and have done perversely;<WH5753> we have dealt wickedly;<WH7561>'

if they return<WH7725> to you with all their heart<WH3824> and with all their soul<WH5315> in the land<WH776> of their enemies,<WH341> who carried them captive,<WH7617> and pray<WH6419> to you toward<WH1870> their land,<WH776> which you gave<WH5414> to their fathers,<WH1> the city<WH5892> which you have chosen,<WH977> and the house<WH1004> which I have built<WH1129> for your name:<WH8034>
then hear<WH8085> their prayer<WH8605> and their supplication<WH8467> in heaven,<WH8064> your dwelling<WH3427> place,<WH4349> and maintain<WH6213> their cause;<WH4941>

and forgive<WH5545> your people<WH5971> who have sinned<WH2398> against you,<WH6588> and all their transgressions in which they have transgressed<WH6586> against you;<WH5414> and give them compassion<WH7356> before<WH6440> those who carried them captive,<WH7617> that they may have compassion on them<WH7355>
(for they are your people,<WH5971> and your inheritance,<WH5159> which you brought out<WH3318> of Egypt,<WH4714> from the midst<WH8432> of the furnace<WH3564> of iron<WH1270>);

that your eyes<WH5869> may be open<WH6605> to the supplication<WH8467> of your servant,<WH5650> and to the supplication<WH8467> of your people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> to listen<WH8085> to them whenever they cry to you.<WH7121>

For you separated<WH914> them from among all the peoples<WH5971> of the earth,<WH776> to be your inheritance,<WH5159> as you spoke<WH1696> by<WH3027> Moses<WH4872> your servant,<WH5650> when you brought<WH3318> our fathers<WH1> out of Egypt,<WH4714> Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH136>"

It was so,<WH8010> that when Solomon had made an end<WH3615> of praying<WH6419> all this prayer<WH8605> and supplication<WH8467> to Yahweh,<WH3068> he arose<WH6965> from before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh,<WH3068> from kneeling<WH3766> on his knees<WH1290> with his hands<WH3709> spread forth<WH6566> toward heaven.<WH8064>
He stood,<WH5975> and blessed<WH1288> all the assembly<WH6951> of Israel<WH3478> with a loud<WH1419> voice,<WH6963> saying,<WH559>

"Blessed<WH1288> be Yahweh,<WH3068> who has given<WH5414> rest<WH4496> to his people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> according to all that he promised.<WH1696> There has not failed<WH5307> one<WH259> word<WH1697> of all his good<WH2896> promise,<WH1697> which he promised<WH1697> by<WH3027> Moses<WH4872> his servant.<WH5650>
May Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> be with us,<WH1> as he was with our fathers. Let him not leave<WH5800> us,<WH5203> nor forsake us;

that he may incline<WH5186> our hearts<WH3824> to him,<WH3212> to walk in all his ways,<WH1870> and to keep<WH8104> his commandments,<WH4687> and his statutes,<WH2706> and his ordinances,<WH4941> which he commanded<WH6680> our fathers.<WH1>

Let these my words,<WH1697> with which I have made supplication<WH2603> before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> be near<WH7138> to Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> day<WH3119> and night,<WH7138> that he may maintain<WH6213> the cause<WH4941> of his servant,<WH5650> and the cause<WH4941> of his people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> as every<WH1697> day shall require;<WH3117>
that all the peoples<WH5971> of the earth<WH776> may know<WH3045> that Yahweh,<WH3068> he is God.<WH430> There is none else.

"Let your heart<WH3824> therefore be perfect<WH8003> with Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> to walk<WH3212> in his statutes,<WH2706> and to keep<WH8104> his commandments,<WH4687> as at this day.<WH3117>"
The king,<WH4428> and all Israel<WH3478> with him,<WH2076> offered sacrifice<WH2077> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>

So Solomon<WH8010> held<WH6213> the feast<WH2282> at that time,<WH6256> and all Israel<WH3478> with him,<WH1419> a great assembly,<WH6951> from the entrance<WH935> of Hamath<WH2574> to the brook<WH5158> of Egypt,<WH4714> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> and seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> even fourteen<WH702> days.<WH3117>

On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> he sent<WH7971> the people<WH5971> away;<WH7971> and they blessed<WH1288> the king,<WH4428> and went<WH3212> to their tents<WH168> joyful<WH8056> and glad<WH2896> of heart<WH3820> for all the goodness<WH2896> that Yahweh<WH3068> had shown<WH6213> to David<WH1732> his servant,<WH5650> and to Israel<WH3478> his people.<WH5971>
